about.about: Hi, I'm Tej Parmar, a passionate tech enthusiast and final-year B.Tech student with a knack for solving real-world problems using cutting-edge technologies. With experience in Flutter development, Full Stack Development, and Generative AI, I specialize in creating scalable and impactful applications.  I am driven by the pursuit of innovative solutions to real-world challenges. I am actively working on several projects involving Generative AI and have previously explored its potential to transform industries through innovative applications.
